# Grymm's Grey Grimoire (Level 1 Universalist)
## Overview
*This is a simple, unadorned spellbook, its pages made of the finest vellum.*

**Value** xgp

**Spells**

**Traits:** * Pragmatic Activator,***** *Spark of Creation, Windfall*

**Flaws:**

   Frail (-1 from the number of hit points you gain at each level.)

   Just for Show (racial) (lose +1 natural armor bonus; -1 to AC)

   Noncombatant (-2 to hit in melee)

**Drawbacks:**

   Xenophobic (-2 penalty on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks)

**Feats/Virtual Feats (gained through items):** Arcane Craftsman (cost and time), Arcane Master Craftsman (*purple shard ioun stone)*, Collegiate Wizard *(cerulean blue cylinder ioun stone)*, Combat Reflexes (*argent spindle ioun stone*), Craft Anywhere (*purple disc ioun stone*), Craft Construct, Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Craft Wondrous Item (*purple cube ioun stone*), Extraordinary Artisan (cost and time) (*purple isocagon ioun stone)*, Fast Item Creation (*purple octahedron ioun stone*), Frugal Crafting *(purple scalahedron ioun stone)*, Master Artificer (*purple ovoid ioun stone*), Mental Fortitude (argent sphere ioun stone), Mercantile Background (*golden anhedron ioun stone*), Mind Over Body (*argent ovoid ioun stone)*, Scribe Scroll *(purple spindle ioun stone),* Spell Mastery* (light green anhedron ioun stone),* Swift Crafting *(purple briolette ioun stone),* Unarmored Defense Proficiency (intermediate) (*teal ovoid ioun stone)*,
